title: Captured by the Gay Holiday Elf
description: Santa's coming to town, and this year, he's going to get a big surprise!  Craig is one of many official Santas, sent to cities and towns all around the world on Christmas Eve to deliver presents to deserving kids. As he goes down one chimney, he's greeted by what he thinks is an elf sitting on a shelf. But it's not--it's a Gnome on the Throne. And this little gnome has some needs that only Santa can fulfil!  This erotic holiday tale contains m/m bondage, rimming, oral, anal, and one naughty gnome making sure that Santa gets what HE wants for Christmas.
author: Flint Ramrod
